description.en: A skin condition caused by clogged hair follicles.
description.id: Kondisi kulit yang terjadi akibat pori-pori tersumbat.

recommendation.en: Maintain skin hygiene and consult a doctor if severe.
recommendation.id: Jaga kebersihan kulit dan konsultasikan ke dokter jika parah.

description.en: A condition causing sudden sensation of spinning due to inner ear problems.
description.id: Kondisi yang menyebabkan sensasi berputar tiba-tiba akibat masalah pada telinga dalam.

recommendation.en: Perform Epley maneuver and consult an ENT specialist.
recommendation.id: Lakukan manuver Epley dan konsultasikan ke dokter THT.

description.en: A chronic, potentially life-threatening condition caused by HIV interfering with the body's ability to fight infection.
description.id: Kondisi kronis yang mengancam jiwa akibat virus HIV yang merusak kemampuan tubuh melawan infeksi.

recommendation.en: Immediate antiretroviral therapy (ART) and specialist care required.
recommendation.id: Segera lakukan terapi antiretroviral (ART) dan perawatan spesialis.

description.en: Liver inflammation caused by drinking too much alcohol.
description.id: Peradangan hati yang disebabkan oleh konsumsi alkohol berlebihan.

recommendation.en: Stop alcohol consumption immediately and seek medical help.
recommendation.id: Hentikan konsumsi alkohol segera dan cari bantuan medis.

description.en: An immune system reaction to a foreign substance usually not harmful to your body.
description.id: Reaksi sistem kekebalan tubuh terhadap zat asing yang biasanya tidak berbahaya.

recommendation.id: Hindari pemicu alergi dan minum obat antihistamin.

description.en: Swelling and tenderness of one or more joints.
description.id: Pembengkakan dan nyeri pada satu atau lebih sendi.

recommendation.en: Physical therapy and pain management medication.
recommendation.id: Lakukan fisioterapi dan gunakan obat pereda nyeri.

description.en: A condition in which airways narrow and swell and may produce extra mucus.
description.id: Kondisi di mana saluran napas menyempit, membengkak, dan memproduksi lendir berlebih.

recommendation.en: Use inhalers as prescribed and avoid respiratory triggers.
recommendation.id: Gunakan inhaler sesuai resep dan hindari pemicu pernapasan.

description.en: Age-related wear and tear affecting the spinal disks in your neck.
description.id: Keausan terkait usia yang mempengaruhi cakram tulang belakang di leher.

recommendation.en: Physical therapy, posture correction, and pain relief.
recommendation.id: Fisioterapi, perbaiki postur tubuh, dan pereda nyeri.

description.en: A highly contagious viral infection causing an itchy, blister-like rash.
description.id: Infeksi virus yang sangat menular menyebabkan ruam melepuh dan gatal.

recommendation.en: Use calamine lotion for itching and isolate to prevent spread.
recommendation.id: Gunakan lotion calamine untuk gatal dan isolasi diri untuk mencegah penularan.

description.en: A condition where bile flow from the liver acts slowly or stops completely.
description.id: Kondisi di mana aliran empedu dari hati melambat atau berhenti total.

recommendation.en: Requires medical diagnosis to treat the underlying liver condition.
recommendation.id: Memerlukan diagnosa medis untuk mengobati kondisi hati yang mendasarinya.

description.en: A viral infection of your nose and throat (upper respiratory tract).
description.id: Infeksi virus pada hidung dan tenggorokan (saluran pernapasan atas).

recommendation.en: Rest, hydration, and over-the-counter cold remedies.
recommendation.id: Istirahat cukup, hidrasi, dan obat flu yang dijual bebas.
